code: export var CREATE_PRODUCT='CREATE_PRODUCT';export var CREATE_PRODUCT_SUCCESS='CREATE_PRODUCT_SUCCESS';export var CREATE_PRODUCT_FAIL='CREATE_PRODUCT_FAIL';export var CREATE_PRODUCT_RESET='CREATE_PRODUCT_RESET';export var createProduct=function createProduct(params){return{type:CREATE_PRODUCT,params:params};};export var createProductSuccess=function createProductSuccess(response){return{type:CREATE_PRODUCT_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var createProductFail=function createProductFail(response){return{type:CREATE_PRODUCT_FAIL,response:response};};export var createProductReset=function createProductReset(){return{type:CREATE_PRODUCT_RESET};};
